search_general_talk_2085_lusamine_family:
I was just about to go up the mountain to look at
the moon with Clefairy.

Would you like to come with us once we find her,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
What about this Pokémon?

Isn’t my Jigglypuff cute? We’re practicing singing
right now!
Here we go!
I’m feeling...kind of...sleepy...
What about this Pokémon?
My Blissey’s eggs are the best in the world!

They say that Blissey’s eggs are chock-full of
happiness—and that anyone who eats them will
be happy, too!

That’s like something out of a fairy tale!
How wonderful!
In fact, since I eat them every day...

you could say that my belly is chock-full of
happiness!

Hmm...I wonder where my little Clefairy could
have run off to.
Did you hear that? That was Clefairy’s cry!
Let me know if you see any.
Oh, great! If we could just get a little string...
Uh-oh! Let’s get out of here!

While they were making their escape,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s clothes got caught
on a branch and ripped.
Phew. Looks like we got away safely.
Oh, come on...

You can’t get your own clothes ripped trying to
help fix mine. That defeats the purpose!
Hurray! It finally evolved!
H-huh?
Ahhh!

Hmph. Looks like he still has a long way to go in
his training.
Hm? Are you hungry or something?

Hmph. Guess I have no choice. This is Silvally’s,
but I’ll share some with you.

What? I’m not giving away all of it! I’ll save some
for you!
This is shaping up to be a tough search.
Hey! Isn’t that...
